snippet: Jose Luis Zelaya’s failed bid to become the student body president at Texas A&M University exposed a range of feelings surrounding his status as an illegal immigrant.
abstract: Failed bid of Honduran immigrant Jose Luis Zelaya to become student body president at Texas A&M University exposes range of feelings surrounding his status as an illegal immigrant; Zelaya's campaign and defeat illustrate how the roughly 300 Texas A&M students who are illegal immigrants feel both welcome and unwelcome at one of the most conservative colleges in the country.
lead_paragraph: Jose Luis Zelaya’s failed bid to become the student body president at Texas A&M University exposed a range of feelings surrounding his status as an illegal immigrant.

headline.seo: Running to Lead Class, Illegal Immigrant Gets Mixed Response
headline.main: Vying for Campus President, Illegal Immigrant Gets a Gamut of Responses
headline.print_headline: Vying for Campus President, Illegal Immigrant Gets a Gamut of Responses
